input.sentences: most of the statues were abstract .
we tried to figure out what this was .
in the end | we came to the conclusion that these statues were not meant to be deciphered .
output.sentences: Last weekend we visited a local park.
I loved the statues of abstract design.
Their subject was up to personal interpretation.
The figure that I liked the most stood alone.
Mom was there when the statues had been placed there and was sure that she knew what they meant and how they were meant to be deciphered.
